CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Id = "012i0000000tKt2" , IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Declined_Passed__c )), "Declined / Passed", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Signed_Agreement__c)), "Signed Agreement", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Due_Diligence__c)), "Due Diligence", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Letter_of_Intent__c )), "Submitted LOI", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Met_With_Management__c )), "Met with Management", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Proposal_Indication__c )), "Submitted Proposal / IOI", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Received_Book__c)), "Received Book", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Executed_Confidentiality_Agreement__c )), "Executed CA", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Phone_Discussion__c )), "Phone Discussion", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Initial_Contact__c )), "Initial Contact", "No Status") ))))))))),"No Status")
CustomField.label: Status (Buyside)
